title: Woman Blows Smoke In Her 1-Month-Old Daughter's Face On Livestream, Viewers Enraged
text:
A mother livestreamed herself on Facebook as she blew smoke in her one-month-old daughter’s face and shook the girl.

She is now behind bars.

Tybresha Sexton, was charged with child abuse after concerned viewers called up the police, who arrested her at her home on Sunday in Chattanooga, Tennessee.

Facebook

The video of the incident has been removed from Facebook, but a 43-second clip from another user shows Sexton lighting the cigarette near the infant’s head. The video also shows Sexton finishing a bottle of Svedka Vodka with one hand while holding the child - Stormy - in the other hand.

Police also said that Sexton was also seen picking up the infant by one arm and dropping her. Throughout the livestream, the viewers urged her to stop, otherwise the baby would die and especially when she started shaking the child, the viewers pleaded with her to stop.

Police also said that Sexton told them that the reports were not true and allowed them to check the infant. But while investigation, officers noted a heavy smell of alcohol on Sexton’s breath when they arrived at her home.

According to the police affidavit, Sexton shouted that she “didn’t want that fucking baby, anyway,” adding that she “already told them that”, according to an affidavit obtained by WTVC. Sexton has been charged with child abuse and disorderly conduct. Her child is now staying with Sexton’s mother.
